name: MAZE (itch) (SHEED MOHAMED)
description:
It is a simple 2d game done in a unity engine. The player should reach the destination without getting hit by the traps.

Controls:

The player can be controlled by using arrow keys.

Check out the gameplay video

https://drive.google.com/file/d/18HK8wJSK7h4ftLauE0BgRn39rCBCKT-3/view?usp=shari...
